encodingDesc.p: The file data/letters/1880-9/1886/86-12-00c-final.doc was converted from Microsoft Word format into TEI using an XProc pipeline.

head.supplied: Heartfelt thanks, dear Mr Tepper, for the festive card with the New Year greetings! May the New Year also be a joyful one for you ¶ Your ¶ ¶ Ferd. von Mueller. ¶ I will report later on ¶ Spyridium ...

div.p: RB MSS M198, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: MS annotation by Tepper: 'Kangaroo Island Plants Dec 1886'. List dated to December 1886 as the earliest it could have been sent; however, the annotation might refer to the date of sending the specimens rather than the list.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: Translations are given on a new line under the German.

cell.p: Juncus maritimus wahrscheinlich, werde genaua nachsehen, soweit es von Fehlenden Samen zulassen

cell.style: padding-left: 0.075in; padding-right: 0.075in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
padding-left: 0.075in; padding-right: 0.075in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
cell.p: [probably, will check closely as far as the lack of seeds permits]

cell.style: padding-left: 0.075in; padding-right: 0.075in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
padding-left: 0.075in; padding-right: 0.075in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

cell.p: Privat. Dies kann doch wohl nicht Hydrocot. crassius. sein. Ich habe die Beschreibung nicht zur Hand

cell.style: padding-left: 0.075in; padding-right: 0.075in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
padding-left: 0.075in; padding-right: 0.075in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
cell.p: [Private. This probably cannot be Hydrocotyle crassiuscula . I do not have the description at hand]

div.p: Inniger Dank, lieber Herr Tepper, für die festliche Karte mit dem Neujahsgruss! Mag auch Ihnen das Jahr ein Freudevolles werden

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Über Spyridium u einiges Andere werde ich später berichten.
Heartfelt thanks, dear Mr Tepper, for the festive card with the New Year greetings! May the New Year also be a joyful one for you

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: I will report later on Spyridium and some others.
